security: The document mentions Hada Mireya Rosete being a member of the Revolutionary Council and on a Finance Department-Delegations list. "Subject is a member of the Revolutionary Council and is on a Finance Dopartment-Delegations list."
summary: This record contains information on Hada Mireya Rosete, including her birthdate, location, and activities related to the Revolutionary Council in Cuba.
summary_one_paragraph: This document contains records pertaining to Hada Mireya Rosete, born in Havana on April 6, 1925. It details name trace requests, FRD (likely related to financial resources) reports noting her work in the media field and establishment of contacts with newspaper editors and radio stations. It further indicates her membership in the Revolutionary Council and her inclusion on a Finance Department-Delegations list representing Uruguay. The record also notes she is divorced and a local FRD type providing support to a station program.
title: Record on Hada Mireya Rosete
